Welcome to the "The Program" web site, the third of three web sites that I'm building on my path to becoming a Front-End Web Developer. I've created this page to expand on more complex javaScript and pseudo database senarios.

Get with "The Program"

Learn to "Code"

New User

Final Exam

The Final Exam is a Dashboard simulation for a Service Manager. If you choose to Enter "The Program" I set up an environment to display current information on employee's, tool's, vehicle's, client's and work order's. You can add employee's, tool's and vehicles to your database. The last thing you can do is create a work order. You can attach employee's, tool's and vehicle's from the database including your entries.
